text: Israel launches an air strike in Beirut as part of continuing military operations against Hezbollah. Lebanese officials say at least seven people were killed. A powerful ocean storm hits Taiwan.

The typhoon brought high winds, flooding and landslides to the southern port city of Goushung. In Thailand, a small town holds a funeral to mourn 23 children and teachers who died in a bus fire Tuesday. And Malawi launches a food program to feed at least 5.7 million people as the country faces hunger caused by a lack of rainfall.
